title: resume
description: This repository contains the TeX source code and generated HTML output for my resume. It serves as a project demonstrating my skills in typesetting with TeX to create a professional-looking resume and converting it to a web-friendly format using HTML. The project showcases my ability to present information clearly and concisely for potential employers.

title: robofleet-dashboard
description: The robofleet-dashboard repository hosts a web-based interface for visualizing and interacting with data from the Robofleet robotic fleet management system. Built using JavaScript, Python (likely for backend services), HTML, and CSS, this project provides a user-friendly dashboard to monitor robot status, track their location, and potentially control their actions. It serves as a central point for managing and observing a fleet of robots, offering insights into their operation and performance.

title: ros-log-viewer
description: ros-log-viewer is a web-based tool for visualizing and analyzing ROS (Robot Operating System) log files, offering a user-friendly interface to filter, search, and interpret ROS messages. Built using JavaScript, Python, HTML, CSS, and shell scripting, this project provides a convenient way to debug and understand ROS-based systems by transforming raw log data into insightful visualizations, facilitating project development and troubleshooting.

title: sleep-debt-tracker
description: Sleep Debt Tracker is a web application built with TypeScript, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS designed to help users visualize and manage their sleep debt. This project allows users to input their sleep schedule, track accumulated sleep debt, and gain insights into their sleep patterns, making it a valuable tool for improving sleep hygiene.

title: NextJs-Dashboard
description: NextJs-Dashboard is a project built with TypeScript, CSS, and JavaScript showcasing a modern, responsive dashboard interface. This repository demonstrates best practices in Next.js development, focusing on creating a dynamic and visually appealing user experience. It serves as a learning resource and potential starting point for building complex web applications with Next.js, incorporating features such as data visualization and user interaction.

title: raven-v2
description: Raven-v2 is a project built with TypeScript and JavaScript, focusing on [insert primary function gleaned from README or inferred from name, e.g., "building a modern web application," "implementing a real-time chat platform," "exploring advanced data visualization techniques"]. This repository showcases [mention key features or goals, e.g., "a clean architecture, robust type safety, and efficient user interface," "scalable backend infrastructure and a user-friendly chat experience," "interactive charts and customizable dashboards"]. It explores [mention specific technologies or concepts, e.g., "advanced TypeScript features and modern JavaScript frameworks," "WebSockets and message queuing for real-time communication," "d3.js and other data visualization libraries for insightful data presentation"].

title: devboard
description: Devboard is a full-stack project scaffolding tool built with Next.js 14 (pages router), TypeScript, and MUI. This repository serves as a template for quickly setting up new projects, incorporating best practices with React Query for efficient data fetching, and providing a well-structured codebase to accelerate development workflows and minimize boilerplate.

title: Map-Visualisation
description: This project visualizes geographical data on an interactive map using Python for data processing and HTML for the front-end display. It's a simple yet effective demonstration of data visualization techniques, leveraging open-source libraries to represent data points and regions on a map, making it a useful example for learning about geographical data representation and web-based visualization projects.

title: jovian
description: Jovian is a CRUD application built with Python, Flask, and PostgreSQL, providing a foundational project for learning and implementing web development principles. This repository showcases a practical implementation of Create, Read, Update, and Delete operations, utilizing HTML, CSS, and Shell scripting alongside the core Python backend, demonstrating a complete web application stack suitable for educational or personal projects focused on database-driven applications.

title: next-idea-board
description: Next-idea-board is a project implementing a dynamic and collaborative idea board built with Next.js, TypeScript, CSS, and JavaScript. This repository houses the code for a web application that allows users to brainstorm, organize, and prioritize ideas within a visual and interactive interface, designed to facilitate project planning and team collaboration.

title: dynamic-event-calendar
description: Dynamic-event-calendar is a JavaScript-based project that creates a customizable and interactive event calendar. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, this repository provides a flexible solution for displaying and managing events, offering a dynamic and user-friendly interface for scheduling and visualizing activities.

title: iot-asset-tracking
description: This repository hosts a modern IoT asset tracking web application built with Next.js, TypeScript, and styled with Tailwind CSS. It utilizes Supabase for backend services and database management, providing a robust platform for monitoring and managing physical assets. The project showcases best practices in modern web development while leveraging the power of these technologies to create a real-time asset tracking solution.

title: genietalks
description: GenieTalks is a full-stack web application leveraging TypeScript, Vite, and Express.js to provide a platform for interactive conversations powered by the Gemini API. Built with a modern frontend using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, this project showcases a practical implementation of large language models for engaging user experiences.  It demonstrates the integration of server-side logic with a responsive client-side interface for a real-world AI-driven application.

title: next-voting
description: Next-voting is a modern, decentralized voting application built with Next.js, TypeScript, CSS, and JavaScript. This project provides a secure and transparent platform for creating and participating in polls, leveraging blockchain-inspired principles for immutability and verifiability. It explores practical applications of front-end technologies within the realm of democratic processes and serves as a learning resource for web development and decentralized systems.

title: finance-with-python
description: This repository, built using Jupyter Notebook and Python, contains projects focused on practical applications of Python in finance. It explores various financial concepts and provides hands-on coding examples to analyze data, build models, and automate tasks related to areas like portfolio management, risk analysis, and financial forecasting. The goal is to provide a learning resource for individuals interested in leveraging Python for financial analysis and decision-making.

title: atg-world
description: ATG-World is a web-based project built using TypeScript, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS, focused on [Insert brief project purpose inferred from README or common sense, e.g., visualizing global data, creating an interactive world map, etc.]. This repository houses the codebase for [Elaborate slightly on main feature or function, e.g., the dynamic map interface, the data processing scripts, etc.] and demonstrates a [Mention a key feature or skill showcased, e.g., responsive design, data visualization, etc.] approach to [Mention broad project goal, e.g., web development, data exploration, etc.].

title: fruit-seller
description: Fruit-Seller is a fully-functional e-commerce project built with Next.js 14 (using the pages router), TypeScript, and React. It leverages Material UI (MUI) for a responsive and visually appealing user interface and employs React Query for efficient data fetching and caching. This project demonstrates a modern approach to building scalable and maintainable web applications with a focus on type safety and best practices in e-commerce development.
